xt:extension.xt:author: Antenna House, Inc.
xt:extension.xt:name: ahfsettings

xt:description.p: Edit Antenna House Formatter Option Settings File.
xt:description.pre:
# ahfsettings 7.4.6
- SQF to rename some out-of-date attributes. - Inserting `ChangeLog.md` contents into release's `add-on.xml`. - Including template XML file in framework.
# ahfsettings 7.4.5
- `gs-add-options` replaced by `gs-options` in V7.1. (#3) - Added instructions for modifying the schema. (#3) - Removed some obsolete properties.
# ahfsettings 7.4.4
- Remove duplicate `pair-kerning`. (#2)
# ahfsettings 7.4.3
- Updated for Antenna House Formatter V7.4.
